page.title: 01INTRODUCTION TO SWANMORE
page.content: Swanmore is built in the middle of the country. The atmosphere in Swanmore is clean and never polluted. There are lots of fields and trees. There is even an apple orchard on the Droxford road. There are shops dotted around. There are no major factories, just a very small one. There are a lot of houses in Swanmore, but that doesn't spoil the village. There are two schools, one comprehensive and one primary. There is a parish room and a big village hall and a scout hut. There is a church and a chapel and two vicarages. Swanmore is a pleasant place. {Dannie Hay}
